title: Ebro In The Morning - Special Guest: Mary J. Blige
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Fresh off of her Super Bowl Halftime show performance Sunday (2/13), the Queen of Hip-Hop Soul Mary J. Blige sits down with Ebro in the Morning to discuss a variety of topics and share amazing stories.

Learn about her Super Bowl performance, thoughts on dating, being an actress, how she got her moniker, and hear rare stories on Jay-Z Biggie, Diddy, George Michael, 50 Cent, Method Man, and more!! Her album 'Good Morning Gorgeous' is available now. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
